steps.name: Initial Assessment
steps.description: Gathering and reviewing all preliminary information and requirements from the client.

steps.name: Data Collection
steps.description: Collecting all relevant data from various sources to understand the current process.
steps.input: System logs, User data, Historical records

steps.name: Process Mapping
steps.description: Visually mapping out the 'as-is' process flow to identify bottlenecks and inefficiencies.

steps.name: Root Cause Analysis
steps.description: Identifying the underlying causes of problems and inefficiencies in the existing process.

steps.name: Solution Brainstorming
steps.description: Generating potential solutions to address the identified root causes.

steps.name: Feasibility Study
steps.description: Assessing the practicality and viability of proposed solutions.

steps.name: Solution Design
steps.description: Developing detailed designs for the selected solutions, including new process flows.
steps.tools: UML diagrams, BPMN tools, Design software

steps.name: Development/Configuration
steps.description: Building or configuring the necessary systems and tools for the new process.

steps.name: Testing Phase
steps.description: Rigorously testing the new process and systems to ensure they meet requirements.
steps.tools: Test automation frameworks, Bug tracking systems

steps.name: Training and Documentation
steps.description: Preparing users for the new process and creating comprehensive documentation.

steps.name: Pilot Deployment
steps.description: Implementing the new process on a small scale to identify any unforeseen issues.

steps.name: Full Rollout
steps.description: Deploying the new process across the entire organization or target group.

steps.name: Performance Monitoring
steps.description: Continuously monitoring the new process to track its effectiveness and identify deviations.

steps.name: Feedback and Iteration
steps.description: Collecting user feedback and making necessary adjustments for continuous improvement.

steps.name: Process Optimization
steps.description: Ongoing refinement and enhancement of the process based on performance data and feedback.
